faqs.q: How many calories in 1/2 cup granulated sugar?
faqs.a: Approximately 387 kcal for unpacked granulated white sugar.
Yes, 100% carbohydrates (all sugars) with 0 g protein, fat, or fiber per 100 g.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in 1/2 cup?
faqs.a: About 100 g, equivalent to 25 teaspoons or 8 tablespoons.

faqs.q: Does brown sugar have more calories than white?
faqs.a: Slightly less—around 380 kcal per 100 g due to moisture content.
